title: The Spellsparkler
content:
xperiments. Quarterstaff Versatile 1.8 310

The Spellsparkler

Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands

1d8 (1d6) Bludgeoning

Electric Veins: When the wielder deals damage with a spell or cantrip, they gain 2 Lightning Charges.

Weapon Enchantment +1

Main Hand OnlyTopple

Yrre the Sparkstruck intended to give the spellsparkler to Lenore, a cleric of Mystra and old lover. But when the gnome returned to the cleric's tower, they found it empty - inhabited only by dust and abandoned experiments.
